name: Resurrection Rancher
description:
Made For IGMC 2022 with Pixel Game Maker MV!

**SPOILERS** Watch the development timelapse here:

THEME: Resurrection

You are new to the heavenly order and have been tasked to resurrect a deceased town. An old head 'gavel' will help aid you in your work.

CREDITS:

  • Developer/Design - Baz
  • Art - Noobk
  • Music - Matthew Pablo, Syncopika, Rezoner
  • Title Font - Jakob Fischer

IMPORTANT NOTE: The game folder installs onto the C:\ directory to prevent save issues incase ran as a non administrator.
